title: Cybersecurity & Ethical Hacking Magazines
description: This is a collection of the top and most cyber security online magazines.

magazines.name: Australian Cybersecurity Magazine
magazines.description: Covers the latest in cybersecurity news, analysis, and insights from Australia and beyond, providing expert commentary and features on security trends.

magazines.name: Brilliance Security Magazine
magazines.description: Focuses on delivering timely and relevant security news, with a particular emphasis on cybersecurity, physical security, and emerging threats.

magazines.name: Cisomag
magazines.description: A comprehensive resource for CISO-level professionals, offering in-depth articles on security management, threat intelligence, and industry best practices.

magazines.name: CPOMagazine
magazines.description: Provides insights and analysis on data privacy, cybersecurity, and the latest regulatory updates affecting security professionals worldwide.

magazines.name: CyberDefense
magazines.description: An industry leader in providing fresh perspectives on security news, technology, and solutions to enhance cybersecurity defenses.

magazines.name: CyberMagazine
magazines.description: Focuses on delivering the latest cybersecurity news, expert analysis, and features on innovative technologies and industry trends.

magazines.name: CyberProtection-Magazine
magazines.description: Dedicated to exploring advanced cybersecurity protection methods, risk management, and the latest in cyber defense strategies.

magazines.name: CyberSecurity Ventures
magazines.description: Provides market research, cybersecurity reports, and expert insights into the evolving landscape of cyber threats and defenses.

magazines.name: CyberSecurityMag
magazines.description: Offers a blend of news, expert opinions, and features on the latest cybersecurity challenges and innovations.

magazines.name: CyberSecurity-Magazine
magazines.description: Focuses on delivering up-to-date information on cybersecurity trends, technological advancements, and strategic insights.

magazines.name: FranklineTech
magazines.description: Provides a variety of cybersecurity news, reviews, and analysis on the latest in technology and security innovations.

magazines.name: InsightMagazineUK
magazines.description: Delivers critical insights and analysis on cybersecurity issues, regulatory changes, and industry developments in the UK.

magazines.name: InfoSecurity Magazine
magazines.description: A leading source of cybersecurity news and analysis, offering expert commentary, research reports, and in-depth features.

magazines.name: Security Magazine
magazines.description: Covers a broad range of security topics, including cybersecurity, physical security, risk management, and business continuity.

magazines.name: SC Magazine
magazines.description: A trusted source for cybersecurity professionals, offering news, analysis, and expert commentary on security threats and solutions.

magazines.name: CyberSecurity Springer Open
magazines.description: An open-access journal publishing high-quality research on all aspects of cybersecurity, from theoretical studies to practical applications.

magazines.name: ThreatTechnology
magazines.description: Focuses on the latest developments in threat intelligence, cybersecurity strategies, and emerging security technologies.

magazines.name: The CyberExpress
magazines.description: Delivers news, analysis, and features on cybersecurity trends, threats, and innovative solutions for security professionals.

magazines.name: US Cybersecurity
magazines.description: Provides comprehensive coverage of cybersecurity news, events, and industry developments in the United States.
